response.name: Failed Response (Client Does Not Exist)

request.description:
# List Countries
lists countries for user, with their details
## Header
- Accept-Language : choose language to retrieve name in that language ('ar', 'en') 

## Response
- name: name of country (according to chosen "Accept-Language")
- isoCode: unique for each country (two letters)
- phoneNumber: each countries phone code 
- emoji: flag for each country
- emojiUnicode: Unicode for each emoji
- timezone: time for each country
